title: Mike Rowe On Safe Spaces, QVC, Singing Opera & Farmers Sex Lives
text:
Mike Rowe, host of the Facebook series Returning the Favor and executive producer and host of the hit show Dirty Jobs joined Brian Kilmeade to discuss his new book "The Way I Heard It", which is a combination of a collection of his favorite episodes from his podcast, The Way I Heard It, and a memoir of his own life. Rowe explained how listening to Paul Harvey and celebrating the unsung working-class heroes were a big influence on him and his career. Rowe also shared funny stories form his past, including, his days on the QVC network singing "My Way" while selling karaoke machines and the "Cat Sack" cat toy.

Plus, Do farmers have better sex lives than most? Mike Rowe weighs in.
